subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire had been playing well since returning from a left knee injury. Now he is expected to miss the rest of the regular season to recover from surgery on his right knee.
snippet: Knicks forward Amar’e Stoudemire had been playing well since returning from a left knee injury. Now he is expected to miss the rest of the regular season to recover from surgery on his right knee.
